sentences.sContent: All the alien innards in the film were actually sheep brains, raspberry jam and chicken entrails.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the alien innards in the film were actually sheep brains, raspberry jam and chicken entrails.
sentences.sCn: 照片中所有的外星人内脏，其实是羊脑，木莓酱和鸡肠。

trans.tranCn: 内脏, 肠, (物体的)内部
trans.tranOther: the inside parts of an animal’s or person’s body, especially their intestines
